title: Fibonacci vs Polynomial
text:
Define a sequencePib(n) as followingPib(0) = 1Pib(1) = 1otherwise,Pib(n) =Pib(n-1) +Pib(n-2) +P(n)HerePis a polynomial.GivennandP, findPib(n) modulo 1,111,111,111.InputFirst line of input contains two integernandd(0 ≤n≤ 109, 0 ≤d≤ 100),dis the degree of polynomial.The second line containsd+1 integersc0,c1…cd, represent the coefficient of the polynomial (ThusP(x) can be written as Σcixi). 0 ≤ci≤ 100 andcd≠ 0 unless d = 0.OutputA single integer represents the answer.ExampleInput:10 0
0Output:89Input:10 0
1Output:177Input:100 1
1 1Output:343742333
